heroSection.subheading: The Costello Law Group delivers personalized legal solutions with proven results.
heroSection.description: Specializing in personal injury, insurance claims, and criminal defense across Cooper City, Davie, Plantation, and Pembroke Pines.

contactFormSection.heading: Get Your Free Case Evaluation
contactFormSection.subheading: Answer a few quick questions and we'll get back to you within 24 hours

practiceAreasSection.heading: Our Practice Areas
practiceAreasSection.description: Personal injury and insurance claims representation in Broward County, Florida. We fight for maximum compensation for our clients.

practiceAreas.title: Car Accidents
practiceAreas.description: Aggressive representation for car accident victims. We fight to get you the compensation you deserve.

practiceAreas.title: Truck Accidents
practiceAreas.description: Specialized expertise in complex commercial truck accident cases with proven results.

practiceAreas.title: Motorcycle Accidents
practiceAreas.description: Dedicated advocacy for motorcyclists injured due to negligence on Florida roads.

practiceAreas.title: Slip & Fall
practiceAreas.description: Holding property owners accountable for dangerous conditions that cause injuries.

practiceAreas.title: Premises Liability
practiceAreas.description: Protecting your rights when injured on someone else's property.

practiceAreas.title: Dog Bites
practiceAreas.description: Compassionate representation for victims of dog attacks and animal injuries.

practiceAreas.title: Wrongful Death
practiceAreas.description: Seeking justice for families who have lost loved ones due to negligence.

practiceAreas.title: PIP Claims
practiceAreas.description: Expert handling of Personal Injury Protection insurance disputes.

practiceAreas.title: Criminal Defense
practiceAreas.description: Vigorous defense of your rights and freedom in criminal proceedings.

practiceAreas.title: Homeowners Insurance
practiceAreas.description: Fighting denied or underpaid homeowners insurance claims.

testimonials.quote: I was extremely impressed with the way Josh and The Costello Law Group handled my personal injury case. Josh's expertise and dedication made a significant difference in achieving a successful and prompt outcome. I am truly grateful for their support and highly recommend their services to anyone dealing with a personal injury matter.
The Costello Law Group fought tirelessly for my case. Their expertise and dedication resulted in a settlement that exceeded my expectations. I couldn't be happier with the outcome.
Josh and his team provided exceptional service throughout my entire case. They kept me informed every step of the way and achieved an outstanding result. Highly recommended!

ctaSection.heading: Ready to Get Started?
ctaSection.description: Schedule your free consultation today. Let's discuss how we can help you achieve the best possible outcome for your case.
